message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this valuable product with you. I believe it's a great opportunity for you to acquire a high-value asset. I'm willing to make a strong opening offer to get us started.
I appreciate your initial offer, Alice. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $1200000. I believe that's a fair price considering the product's value to me.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I was hoping to get a bit more for the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I'm thinking of a price of $1350000. This is a fair compromise, considering the product's value to you and my minimum selling price.

I understand that you're looking to make a profit, Alice, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my previous offer, so I'm thinking of a price of $1250000. I believe that's a fair price considering the product's value to me and your minimum selling price.

Bob, I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit short of my target. I'm willing to make another concession, but I need to get closer to my desired price. I'm thinking of a price of $1320000. This is a fair compromise, considering the product's value to you and my minimum selling price.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my previous offer, so I'm thinking of a price of $1225000. I believe that's a fair price considering the product's value to me and your minimum selling price.
